attributes.action: please ensure that the requirement to keep costs of the 2012 Olympics within budget is applied with the same ferocity with which the Government deals with health Primary Care Trusts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All over the country cash-strapped Primary Care Trusts are being forced to cut services and even close hospitals because they are required by the Government to stay within budgetary limits. It is only fair that the Olympics Delivery Authority should be subject to the same limitations. The nations healthcare is more important than sport for an elite few.
